title: The origins of the magnetic field in tip-RGB, AGB and post-AGB stars
authors:
Renada Konstantinova-Antova, Stefan Georgiev, Agn\`es L\`ebre, Corinne
  Charbonnel, Ana Palacios, Michel Auri\`ere
abstract:
During the last decade and a half, the new generation spectropolarimeter
Narval at Pic du Midi, France allowed the study of weak magnetic fields in cool
giant stars that are fairly evolved after main sequence. We present a short
summary on the recent knowledge on the magnetic fields and activity in giants
situated in the upper right part of the Hertzsprung-Russel (H-R) diagram and
discuss on the possible mechanisms for magnetic field generation in the
asymptotic giants branch (AGB) and post-AGB stars.
